attributes.action: Save Gospel Hall in Southsea from demolition.
attributes.additional_details: A planning application has been made to demolish Gospel Hall, 22 Inglis Road in Southsea, to allow the building of two modern style semi-detached houses in its place. This is a precious and historical local resource and is the last remaining Church in this conservation area, therefore we the undersigned ask the Department for Communities and Local Government to reject any applications which involves the demolition or inappropriate modification to this building.
